content: Does anyone know of a fhir claims resource or CPCDS mapping to 837P? I see a mapping file for the 1500, but not for the 837

@Patrick Santavicca I'll be starting the 837 mapping by October, but you will not see it on an HL7 site, it would only be available from X12. This is the same for all X12 mappings, they would only be available from X12.
@Paul Knapp Is this mapping complete? I'm an X12 member but have not been able to track it down yet. Any links would be greatly appreciated.
